BasicInfo.short: Mocana creates and develops mobile application protection (MAP) app-shielding solutions, enabling users to secure mobile apps.

Products.name: NanoDTLS
Products.description: NanoDTLS provides endpoint authentication, protecting against eavesdropping, message forgery and interference over an unreliable transport.

Products.name: Security Detail - Industrial
Products.description: Security Detail is a comprehensive security technology program.

Products.name: NanoSec
Products.description: NanoSec is Mocana's ultra-optimized, micro-footprint IPsec/IKE solution.

Products.name: DSF for Android
Products.description: Device Security Framework is an extensible software framework that secures all aspects of device data and enterprise communications.

Products.name: NanoSSH
Products.description: NanoSSH is Mocana's super-fast, super- small SSH client/server solution.

Products.name: NanoVoIP
Products.description: NanoVoIP was added to CrunchBase in 2011

Products.name: MAP - Mobile App Protection
Products.description: MAP - Mobile App Protection was added to CrunchBase in 2013

Products.name: NanoCert
Products.description: NanoCert is specially designed for embedded device and consumer electronics manufacturers and their ISVs.

Products.name: NanoSSL
Products.description: NanoSSL can help defeat eavesdropping on wired or wireless connections.

Products.name: NanoCrypto
Products.description: NanoCrypto is a sophisticated, government-certified cryptographic engine.
